verses.verse: God <S%H430><s%> presides <S%H5324><s%> in the great <S%H410><s%> assembly. <S%H5712><s%> He judges <S%H8199><s%> among <S%H7130><s%> the gods. <S%H430><s%>
"How long will you judge <S%H8199><s%> unjustly, <S%H5766><s%> and show <S%H5375><s%> partiality <S%H6440><s%> to the wicked? <S%H7563><s%>" Selah. <S%H5542><s%>
"Defend <S%H8199><s%> the weak, <S%H1800><s%> the poor, and the fatherless. <S%H3490><s%> Maintain the rights <S%H6663><s%> of the poor <S%H6041><s%> and oppressed. <S%H7326><s%>
Rescue <S%H6403><s%> the weak <S%H1800><s%> and needy. <S%H34><s%> Deliver <S%H6403><s%> them out of the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the wicked. <S%H7563><s%>"

They don't <S%H3045><s%> know, neither do they understand. <S%H995><s%> They walk <S%H1980><s%> back and forth in darkness. <S%H2825><s%> All the foundations <S%H4144><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> are shaken. <S%H4131><s%>
I said, <S%H559><s%> "You are gods, <S%H430><s%> all of you are sons <S%H1121><s%> of the Most High. <S%H5945><s%>
Nevertheless <S%H403><s%> you shall die <S%H4191><s%> like men, <S%H120><s%> and fall <S%H5307><s%> like one <S%H259><s%> of the rulers. <S%H8269><s%>"
Arise, <S%H6965><s%> God, <S%H430><s%> judge <S%H8199><s%> the earth, <S%H776><s%> for you inherit <S%H5157><s%> all of the nations. <S%H1471><s%>
